game.title: The Lost Treasure
game.objective: Find the lost treasure of Captain Jack Sparrow.
game.description: Captain Jack Sparrow's ship was attacked by pirates and his treasure was stolen. He needs you to help him find it.

task.description: The dockmaster may have information about the pirates who attacked Captain Jack's ship.
The pirates who stole the treasure may have hidden it on Skull Island.

task.objective: Defeat the pirate captain and obtain the key.
task.description: The key to the treasure chest is required to access it.
